verses.verse: וַיַּ֥עַן <S%H6030><s%> vai-Ya-'an spake אֱלִיה֗וּ <S%H453><s%> 'e-li-Hu, Elihu וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mar. moreover and said

הֲ֭זֹאת <S%H2063><s%> Ha-zot you חָשַׁ֣בְתָּ <S%H2803><s%> cha-Shav-ta Thinkest לְמִשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> le-mish-Pat; thou this to be right אָ֝מַ֗רְתָּ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar-ta, [that] thou saidst צִדְקִ֥י <S%H6664><s%> tzid-Ki My righteousness מֵאֵֽל׃ <S%H410><s%> me-'El. God

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for תֹ֭אמַר <S%H559><s%> To-mar For thou saidst מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What יִּסְכָּן־ <S%H5532><s%> yis-kon- What advantage לָ֑ךְ Lach; מָֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What אֹ֝עִ֗יל <S%H3276><s%> 'o-'Il, will it be unto thee;[and] What profit מֵֽחַטָּאתִֽי׃ <S%H2403><s%> Me-chat-ta-Ti. sin

אֲ֭נִי <S%H589><s%> 'A-ni I אֲשִֽׁיבְךָ֣ <S%H7725><s%> 'a-shi-ve-Cha break מִלִּ֑ין <S%H4405><s%> mil-Lin; answer וְֽאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et רֵעֶ֥יךָ <S%H7453><s%> re-'Ei-cha thee and thy companions עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mach. with

הַבֵּ֣ט <S%H5027><s%> hab-Bet Look שָׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> sha-Ma-yim unto the heavens וּרְאֵ֑ה <S%H7200><s%> u-re-'Eh; and see וְשׁ֥וּר <S%H7789><s%> ve-Shur and behold שְׁ֝חָקִ֗ים <S%H7834><s%> cha-Kim, the clouds גָּבְה֥וּ <S%H1361><s%> ga-ve-Hu [which] are higher מִמֶּֽךָּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Me-ka. than

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If חָ֭טָאתָ <S%H2398><s%> Cha-ta-ta If thou sinnest מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- what תִּפְעָל־ <S%H6466><s%> tif-'ol- what doest בּ֑וֹ bo; וְרַבּ֥וּ <S%H7231><s%> ve-rab-Bu be multiplied פְ֝שָׁעֶ֗יךָ <S%H6588><s%> fe-sha-'Ei-cha, thou against him;or [if] thy transgressions מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- what תַּעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-seh- what doest לּֽוֹ׃ lo.

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If צָ֭דַקְתָּ <S%H6663><s%> Tza-dak-ta If thou be righteous מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- what תִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> tit-ten- what givest ל֑וֹ lo; א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> o Or מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- what מִיָּדְךָ֥ <S%H3027><s%> mi-ya-de-Cha He יִקָּֽח׃ <S%H3947><s%> yik-Kach. thou him;or what receiveth

לְאִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> le-'ish- [may hurt] a man כָּמ֥וֹךָ <S%H3644><s%> ka-Mo-cha like רִשְׁעֶ֑ךָ <S%H7562><s%> rish-'E-cha; Thy wickedness וּלְבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> u-le-ven- [may profit] the son אָ֝דָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam, of man צִדְקָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H6666><s%> tzid-ka-Te-cha. as thou [art] and thy righteousness

מֵ֭רֹב <S%H7230><s%> me-ro By reason of the multitude עֲשׁוּקִ֣ים <S%H6217><s%> 'a-shu-Kim of oppressions יַזְעִ֑יקוּ <S%H2199><s%> yaz-'I-ku; they make [the oppressed] to cry יְשַׁוְּע֖וּ <S%H7768><s%> ye-shav-ve-'U they cry out מִזְּר֣וֹעַ <S%H2220><s%> miz-ze-Ro-a' by reason of the arm רַבִּֽים׃ <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim. of the mighty

וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- no אָמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar, But none saith אַ֭יֵּה <S%H335><s%> 'Ai-yeh how אֱל֣וֹהַּ <S%H433><s%> e-Lo-ah Where [is] God עֹשָׂ֑י <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Sai; my maker נֹתֵ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> no-Ten who giveth זְמִר֣וֹת <S%H2158><s%> ze-mi-Rot songs בַּלָּֽיְלָה׃ <S%H3915><s%> bal-La-ye-lah. in the night

מַ֭לְּפֵנוּ <S%H502><s%> Mal-le-fe-nu Who teacheth מִבַּהֲמ֣וֹת <S%H929><s%> mib-ba-ha-Mot us more than the beasts אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz; of the earth וּמֵע֖וֹף <S%H5775><s%> u-me-'of than the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim air יְחַכְּמֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H2449><s%> ye-chak-ke-Me-nu. and maketh us wiser

שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> sham There יִ֭צְעֲקוּ <S%H6817><s%> Yitz-'a-ku There they cry וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo does not יַעֲנֶ֑ה <S%H6030><s%> ya-'a-Neh; but none giveth answer מִ֝פְּנֵ֗י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei, because גְּא֣וֹן <S%H1347><s%> ge-'on of the pride רָעִֽים׃ <S%H7451><s%> ra-'Im. of evil men

אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> 'a-cho-Sha- Surely שָׁ֭וְא <S%H7723><s%> v vanity לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- Nor יִשְׁמַ֥ע׀ <S%H8085><s%> yish-Ma' will not hear אֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> 'El; Surely God וְ֝שַׁדַּ֗י <S%H7706><s%> ve-shad-Dai, neither will the Almighty לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo Nor יְשׁוּרֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H7789><s%> ye-shu-Ren-nah. regard

אַ֣ף <S%H637><s%> 'af Although כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- when תֹ֭אמַר <S%H559><s%> To-mar thou sayest לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not תְשׁוּרֶ֑נּוּ <S%H7789><s%> te-shu-Ren-nu; thou shalt not see דִּ֥ין <S%H1779><s%> din him [yet] judgment לְ֝פָנָ֗יו <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nav, [is] before וּתְח֥וֹלֵֽל <S%H2342><s%> u-te-Cho-lel him therefore trust לֽוֹ׃ lo.

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah, and now כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- because אַ֭יִן <S%H369><s%> 'A-yin has not פָּקַ֣ד <S%H6485><s%> pa-Kad But now because [it is] not [so] he hath visited אַפּ֑וֹ <S%H639><s%> ap-Po; in his anger וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- Nor יָדַ֖ע <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da' yet he knoweth בַּפַּ֣שׁ <S%H6580><s%> bap-Pash extremity מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od. [it] not in great

וְ֭אִיּוֹב <S%H347><s%> Ve-'i-yov Therefore doth Job הֶ֣בֶל <S%H1892><s%> He-vel in vain יִפְצֶה־ <S%H6475><s%> yif-tzeh- open פִּ֑יהוּ <S%H6310><s%> Pi-hu; his mouth בִּבְלִי־ <S%H1097><s%> biv-li- without דַ֝֗עַת <S%H1847><s%> Da-'at, knowledge מִלִּ֥ין <S%H4405><s%> mil-Lin words יַכְבִּֽר׃ <S%H3527><s%> yach-Bir. he multiplieth פ Peh
